scripts.vercel-build: prisma generate && (prisma migrate deploy 2>/dev/null || (echo 'Baseline existing schema...' && prisma migrate resolve --applied 20250817184630_add_multiple_file_attachments && prisma migrate resolve --applied 20250818134619_add_holiday_fields && prisma migrate resolve --applied 20250819111342_add_user_system_and_ownership && prisma migrate resolve --applied 20250819112551_add_user_profile_fields && prisma migrate resolve --applied 20250819114558_add_profile_photo_field && prisma migrate resolve --applied 20250819114819_add_email_field && prisma migrate resolve --applied 20250819122504_remove_reason_field && prisma migrate resolve --applied 20250819123751_add_email_to_school && echo 'Baseline completed')) && next build
